===Commands===
  * "Start Now" - "NMEA"/"GPX"/"KML"
  It starts the GPS logging immediately. The navigation label changes into "Recording".
  * "Start" - "NMEA"/"GPX"/"KML"
  It starts the GPS logging at the input "Start Date/Time". <p>[http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000013.jpg] [http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000014.jpg] [http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000015.jpg] [http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000016.jpg]</p>
  * "Record"
  * "Pause"
  It pauses the GPS logging. The navigation label changes into "Pausing". <p>[http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000017.jpg] [http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000018.jpg]</p>
  * "Resume"
  It resumes the GPS logging. The navigation label changes into "Recording". <p>[http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000019.jpg] [http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000020.jpg]</p>
  * "Stop"
  It stops the GPS logging. The navigation label no longer appears.
  * "Tool" - "Satellite Status"(only since S60 3rd FP2)
  It displays GPS status from LBS(Location Based Services).  <p>[http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000024.jpg] [http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000025.jpg]</p>
  * "Tool" - "GPS Status"
  It displays GPS status from LBS(Location Based Services). <p>[http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000026.jpg]</p>
  * "Tool" - "NMEA Viewer"
  It displays NMEA 0183 sentences acquired from LBS(Location Based Services). <p>[http://ttgpslogger.googlecode.com/svn/images/Scr000027.jpg]</p>
  * "Help" - "About"
  It displays "About Dialog" of this software.
  * "Help" - "Shortcuts"
  It displays the list of Keyboard shortcuts. 
  * "Exit"

===Keyboard shortcuts(Numeric)===
  * 1 - "Start Now"(NMEA/GPX/KML)
  * 2 - "Start"(NMEA/GPX/KML)
  * 3 - "Pause"/"Resume"/"Stop"
  * ** - Lock keypad
  * 0 - "Record"
  * # - "Tool"
